problems_addressed.solution_summary: Utilize active listening, clear communication, and regular check-ins to build trust and manage expectations.

episode_summary: Dr. Erin Helle discusses the importance of effective communication and client management in real estate. She offers actionable strategies for building strong client relationships, generating referrals, and setting realistic expectations. The episode emphasizes the role of proactive communication and the use of technology to enhance client interactions.
